item.title: Machine Learning with Spark and Docker
item.description: Machine learning has recently been gaining a lot more of my interest, and this weekend I decided I was going to try and get something going. I was able to build a Apache Spark cluster on Hadoop running in Docker container. I used gradle project that I forked. (eat your …
item.dc:creator: Mark Feltner

item.title: First Post
item.description:
Well then, first post here on the new static blog generator.

Why write a static blog generator?

First and foremost, writing more. I want to do it. Becoming a better writer involves writing more, and having a blog is a great place to let out thoughts. I’d also like …
